history.proof: unfold transitive, Term, ltT. intros a b c H1 H2. sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : A * mon n H1 : ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) H2 : ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) c) Unable to unify "OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)" with "ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) c)".

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : A * mon n H1 : ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) H2 : ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) c) Unable to unify "ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b)" with "ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) c)".

ctx: intros a b c H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : A * mon n H1 : ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) H2 : ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) c) Unable to unify "ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) c)" with "ltM (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) c)".

original: unfold transitive, Term, ltT. intros a b c H1 H2. unfold ltT in H1, H2. unfold ltT. unfold ltT in H1. unfold ltT in H2. unfold ltT in H1. unfold ltT in H2. apply os. apply H1. apply H2.
